reviewText: Specifically purchased a region free DVD player to watch this. While the show is wonderful, the picture is very poor. Supposedly purchased new DVD set. I hope this will be released in the USA soon. It's a wonderful series! Would have given 5 stars if the quality was better.

I think Chicago Hope is great when will we be able to buy for U S Regions let's

love this show mandy patinkin is a great actor , i always prefered this to e .r.  which was on the  air about the  same time, its well written, and worth watching , of course start with season 1,
